pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico, on the margins of the G20 Summit in Turkey.

The two leaders discussed the substantial and comprehensive Canada-Mexico bilateral relationship and issues of mutual concern such as climate change.  The leaders also discussed means for deepening engagement as part of North America.

Prime Minister Trudeau reiterated the platform commitment to lift the visa requirement on Mexican citizens.
